TestCase.TestCaseTitle: 1 BSO deletion (implicit delete) in two topics
TestCase.TestCaseObjective: Verify that the National MIP solution provides the ability to delete a BSO from one topic which is represented in two topics.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Nation A creates two BSOs in its National C2I which are included in two topics. Nation B requests from Nation A both topics and receives them. Nation A deletes one BSOs in one of the two topics. Nation B requests the new BSO status from Nation A and receives it. The BSOs is deleted from the one topic and not from the other.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: The test is passed if Nation B receives the delete object status from Nation A. The deleted objects should be removed only from the affected Topic.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates two BSOs included in two Topics.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation A can see BSOs in its C2IS

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation B requests from Nation A both topics.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives BSOs from Nation A

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A deletes one BSO from one Topic
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation A can see the BSO deleted only from affected Topic

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation B requests new situation and receives it.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B displays BSO deleted only from the affected Topic.
